channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 20:35 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 20:35 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Surveat for Further Messages.#Sinelnikovsky. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
